tree.name: Nolan Traore
tree.note: French guard, drafted with MIL pick acquired via NYK in Mikal Bridges trade

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 MIL 1st Round Pick (#19)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Knicks sent Bojan Bogdanovic, five 1st-round picks (incl. MIL 2025), 2028 swap, and a 2nd-rounder to Nets for Mikal Bridges

assetsGivenUp.name: Mikal Bridges
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Acquired from Phoenix in Kevin Durant trade. BKN sent KD and TJ Warren to PHX for Cam Johnson, Mikal Bridges, 4 first-round picks, and pick swap rights.

assetsGivenUp.name: Kevin Durant
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Sign-and-trade: Nets sent D'Angelo Russell, Treveon Graham, and Shabazz Napier to Warriors for Kevin Durant and a protected 2020 1st round pick

assetsGivenUp.name: D'Angelo Russell
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Nets traded Brook Lopez and the 27th pick (Kyle Kuzma) to Lakers for D'Angelo Russell and Timofey Mozgov

assetsGivenUp.name: Brook Lopez
assetsGivenUp.note: Drafted 10th overall by Brooklyn (then New Jersey Nets) in 2008 NBA Draft
